review.title: “Company with management that does not pay much attention to the needs of their employees”
review.pros: Pros – Meaningful work, making a difference & saving lives. Decent benefits & pay. Shift work gives you flexibility with 4 days on & 4 days off.
review.cons: Cons – You'll make it in this job if your own personal satisfaction of the work you do is enough to keep you going. Don't expect much positive reinforcement from your management.
review.advice-to-management: Yes, I would recommend this company to a friend
